fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Youth, Trans-European Networks
eu_initiatives:
In trying to stop Brexit, we are trying to maintain strong relations between the UK and the EU.  
 
We are hopeful of securing reforms at the EU level which will help the UK stay.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: We are doing a tour of Leave / eurosceptic areas which will produce policy recommendations for the EU.
goals__remit:
We are trying to stop Brexit democratically.  
 
We will do this by  
 
i) moving the Labour party against Brexit 
 
ii) mobilising the young against Brexit 
 
iii) getting the EU to offer us reforms that make democratically staying in the EU a more palatable proposition
